channel.title: Hysteria - AnirudhKhanna & JL Music [Trap, Drip, VVVVV]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/vvvvvcollective/anirudhkhanna-jl-music-hysteria
So glad to finally have this song done, it's been a month in the making but it's finally here. Thanks @AnirudhKhanna for starting this off with such a fantastic idea, I know it spiraled out of control at times but I'm glad the result is this amazing, and special thanks to the guys on VVVVV Collective for hosting the song.
[edit: link has been updated]

item.title: Hysteria - AnirudhKhanna & JL Music [Trap, Drip, VVVVV]
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
But that layout is what inspired this. Also you put up with me trying to change everything and trusted that I’d make it work xD That allowed me to go all out to make sure it would be absolutely fantastic.

Anyway, so glad this song has had a successful release! ^w^

Read full topic

item.description:
Ehh I didn’t do that much other than layout the project for u. You really structured and made the whole thing lol.

This is awesome tho

item.title: Hysteria - AnirudhKhanna & JL Music [Trap, Drip, VVVVV]

item.description:
Perhaps xD Pebble tends to sound a bit too tropical sometimes.

Glad you liked it, was my first time with real heavy sampling.

item.title: Hysteria - AnirudhKhanna & JL Music [Trap, Drip, VVVVV]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Pretty slick, awesome sampling. The art is nice do my ears deceive me or am I hearing tropical vibes under the super thick 808?

Well played guys!
